msbt.message: Hello, everyone!
For those hearing this broadcast for the first time, allow me to introduce myself. I'm Isabelle!
Once a day, I share updates on what's happening around the island. It's the island-wide broadcast!
I'll pack as much useful information as I can into these broadcasts, so I hope you find them helpful!
We finally have all the necessary permits to commence building the Museum!
And so we've broken ground on the very spot where Blathers originally put his tent.

"So sorry to inconvenience you all like this today. 'Tis such a shame to suspend your scientific endeavors. However, I hope having our splendid new museum completed by tomorrow will make up for this little setback!"
That was a little message Blathers asked me to pass on to all of you.
Today, 's very own museum opened!
I hope everyone is aware that the Museum is now open for visitors!

It's an amazing museum with separate exhibit rooms for insects, fish, and fossils!Blathers, the museum curator, says exhibit donations will be accepted all day, every day.Entrance to the museum is free, so please do stop by for a visit!
Can you believe it? got the go-ahead to expand our museum!
The museum is closed for remodeling today, but the inconvenience will be worth it, I'm sure.
"My sincerest apologies to the museum's esteemed patrons.Please do visit the completed space tomorrow!"
Blathers asked me to pass on that message to everyone. I hope I captured his restrained excitement.
The new art gallery at the museum is open as of today!
Has everyone heard about the new art gallery now open at the museum?

It's a wonderful gallery with space for paintings, sculptures, and more!The museum's intrepid curator, Blathers, accepts art donations all day, every day. But if you'd like to make a donation, please be mindful that there is fake artwork circulating out there. As always, use your best judgment.

Thanks to everyone's loyal patronage, business at Nook's Cranny is booming. It's going so well, in fact, the shop has outgrown its current footprint!A remodel is in the works to give our favorite brotherly business duo a few more shelves to stock!

The shop will be closed tomorrow to complete the remodel. The drop-off box will also be unavailable. So if you have any urgent buying or selling to do, take care of it today before construction begins!
The shop will be closed tomorrow to complete the remodel. The drop-off box will also be unavailable.
As I mentioned in yesterday's broadcast, Nook's Cranny will be closed today for renovations.

Thanks to everyone's loyal patronage, business at Nook's Cranny is booming. It's going so well, in fact, the shop has outgrown its current footprint!A remodel is in the works to give our favorite brotherly business duo a few more shelves to stock! The shop will be closed today for renovations and the drop-off box will be unavailable as well.
As Mr. Nook stated in yesterday's broadcast, Nook's Cranny will be closed today for renovations!
The grand reopening of the new and improved Nook's Cranny will be tomorrow morning at 8 AM! I'm sure you're all as excited as I am to see how it'll look!
Nook's Cranny is celebrating its grand reopening today!
Here's some great news, folks: Nook's Cranny is open again after some major renovations!
Word is the shop is a lot bigger now. And they have more products on display than ever before!Anything that makes my shopping trips more exciting is OK by me!
The most wonderful thing happened to today. The Able Sisters tailoring shop opened!
Everyone, I'm pleased to inform you that<10_4 />the Able Sisters tailor shop has opened on !
The tailor shop will have all the fashion items you'd expect, as well as a custom-design gallery.This is a great chance for everyone to enjoy new styles and maybe start our own trends!
Starting today, has its very own campsite!
Did you know that is home to a new campsite?

The campsite is a place for visitors to experience the beauty of our island and the kindness of its residents. I can't think of anything more fitting for !I'm sure we'll get plenty of visitors, so take a moment to wander over and spread that island charm!
Now, major island developments like this call for major island ceremonies.We want everyone to participate, so stop by Resident Services and check in with Mr. Nook!
And of course we'll be holding a special ceremony to celebrate the happy news!If you are interested in participating and have the time, please check in with Tom Nook at Resident Services.
Now, let's see To wrap up today's broadcast, I have a very special announcement.
Now Today, I have one very special announcement.

The incredible, amazing musician K.K. Slider is here visiting !Not only that, but Mr. Slider has graciously agreed to put on a special concert for everyone on the island!Stand by for a direct feed from the concert venue!
I hope you all enjoy the show!
